column4: does anyone know how to get to Start System/Administration/Software Sources  from the netbook remix
what are you trying to do ?
i opened a term and did upgrade-manager -d
i opened a term and did update-manager -d
i use the eeepc kernel on my 900 and 701
no - but you'll have to replace the kernel with the eee specific one when youre done upgrading
youll probably need to connect wired, update the kernel, then everything should work
no problem - good luck with upgrade
